Text.Page:
Hoy! Got a minute? My daughter's waiting for me in Tria, but my armor's a wreck and I'm stuck in camp. I could patch it, but lack the leather to do so.

If you could cut down a few {@LinkCreature:29#2011#vicious shoats} and {@LinkCreature:29#1011#thick tusked shoats} and bring me their leather, I'd be able to fix my armor and get going to see my daughter. What do you say?

There's no dross in you, ! This will do rather nicely. I'll just patch up my gear and get going.

I'm not given to long-winded speeches. I owe you. Farewell.
Blast and damnation! I just want to see my daughter. Have you gotten the leather yet?
